com.bignerdranch.expandablerecyclerview.model

Interface Parent<C>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleParent

    public interface Parent<C>
    Interface for implementing required methods in a parent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<C> getChildList()
      Getter for the list of this parent's child items.
      boolean isInitiallyExpanded()
      Getter used to determine if this Parent's View should show up initially as expanded.

    • Method Detail

      • getChildList

        java.util.List<C> getChildList()
        Getter for the list of this parent's child items.

        If list is empty, the parent has no children.

        Returns:
        A List of the children of this Parent

      • isInitiallyExpanded

        boolean isInitiallyExpanded()
        Getter used to determine if this Parent's View should show up initially as expanded.
        Returns:
        true if expanded, false if not
